name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 8, Beijing. A lawyer posted a video saying, are all village heads hereditary now?
As more and more cases are taken, it is found that village heads in many parts of the country are hereditary. Today, I received a client from Hebei. The client said that their village head was killed due to a dispute, and the new village head is the son of the previous one.
The lawyer expressed doubts: Don’t villagers across the country have the right to exercise elections?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Melbourne, Australia, a Chinese student wrote on a piece of paper, "One China Principle, Taiwan is an indispensable part of China" and asked other students to hold up the paper and take a photo of the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 9, Guangzhou Metro Baiyun Dongping or Xialiang Station.
During the morning rush hour, Guangzhou citizens could not stand the long queues for security checks and chose to rush through the security checks collectively. The on-site security personnel and security guards were unable to stop them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that on the evening of the 9th, Guangzhou Metro has quietly cancelled the high-standard security check

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangzhou subway security inspector's contribution: 
Why he thinks subway security is useless, and their daily work:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 6, in Dachang Hui Autonomous County, Langfang, Hebei, a man drove head-on and refused to give way to an ambulance with flashing police lights, forcing the ambulance to reverse and give way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 9th Police report: Administrative detention of the car owner

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen broke the news: The crocodile in Guangzhou Zoo was so hungry that it was skin and bones. If you didn't look carefully, you would think it was a specimen. On December 8, the zoo responded: It was caused by gastroenteritis and is being treated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: A group of young people clashed with knives at a music bar in Chifeng, Inner Mongolia. The knife-wielding man looked to be in his teens and cried at the end.
Afterwards, the floor of the restaurant was covered in blood.
It was said online that the victim's tendons were cut off

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Changchun Taxation Bureau sent a text message warning that there will be policy constraints for medical insurance discontinuation
For those who discontinue medical insurance payment, the reimbursement amount of major disease insurance will be reduced by 4,000 yuan for each year of discontinuation. If you fail to participate in the insurance within the period, the waiting period will be reset, and an additional 30 days of waiting period will be added for each additional year of discontinuation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 9, Guiyang, Guizhou. A man said in the group that he was 19 years old and was arranged by his uncle, a department-level cadre, to work in the Water Conservancy Bureau as deputy director of the office. The man also revealed that although he was only 19 years old, he enjoyed the same treatment as the regular staff, and said that he could be officially enrolled at the age of 23.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 10, Xinhua News Agency released a report on the "female master's degree student lost and 'taken in'" incident. The report mentioned that regarding the suspected rape, after investigation, it was found that the "taker" Zhang knew that Bu had a mental illness, but still had a relationship with her and gave birth to a child. He was suspected of committing a crime and has been taken criminal compulsory measures by the public security organs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 9, the media reported that from January to September, the number of Japanese restaurants closed down reached 650, and the Japanese restaurant industry is experiencing the largest wave of closures in 10 years.
The research data of the new media "Catering Boss Insider" showed that 1.05 million restaurants in China closed down in the first half of the year, which is close to the total number last year.
Netizens replied: "Can you report on the domestic closures?" "I don't know how many restaurants closed down in Shenzhen in nine months"
